sentences.en: A sudden break in the cloud allowed rescuers to spot Michael Benson.
sentences.cn: 天气的突然放晴帮助救援人员找到了迈克尔·本森。

sentences.en: As a concession to his reasonable demand, the doctor allowed him to work.
sentences.cn: 医生向他的合理要求让步了， 允许他工作。

sentences.en: As soon as relations improve they will be allowed to go.
sentences.cn: 一旦关系有所改善，他们就可以获准离开。

sentences.en: Directors weren't allowed any proprietary airs about the product they made.
sentences.cn: 主管们不允许对他们生产的产品以所有者自居。

sentences.en: Foreign aid workers will not be allowed into the stricken areas.
sentences.cn: 国外救援人员不准进入灾区。

sentences.en: Grace allowed her mind to wander to other things.
sentences.cn: 格雷丝任由自己的思绪游走。

sentences.en: He cannot be allowed to dictate what can and cannot be inspected.
sentences.cn: 什么能检查，什么不能检查不能由他说了算。

sentences.en: I have warned him that it is not allowed.
sentences.cn: 我曾警告过他，这是不能容许的。

sentences.en: I was allowed to do whatever I wanted with my life.
sentences.cn: 我可以自由支配自己的生活。

sentences.en: No one carrying arms is allowed within the precincts of a temple.
sentences.cn: 携带武器者不得进入神殿的界域。

sentences.en: Nobody was allowed to eat in the Empress Dowager's presence.
sentences.cn: 在皇帝遗孀面前任何人不得进餐。

sentences.en: Players should be allowed to earn money from advertising.
sentences.cn: 应该允许运动员拍广告挣钱。

sentences.en: She would have cracked up if she hadn't allowed herself some fun.
sentences.cn: 她若是没给自己找点乐趣的话，早就崩溃了。

sentences.en: Smoking will not be allowed.
sentences.cn: 吸烟将被禁止。

sentences.en: The children are allowed to watch TV after school.
sentences.cn: 孩子们被允许在放学后看电视。

sentences.en: These plants are then pollinated and allowed to mature and produce seed.
sentences.cn: 然后，这些植物就被授粉，从而成熟结籽。

sentences.en: This allowed Ms. Kelley to lay aside money to start her business.
sentences.cn: 这样凯利女士就可以把钱存起来创业。

sentences.en: Truman allowed him to stagger on for nearly another two years.
sentences.cn: 杜鲁门允许他又硬撑了近两年。

sentences.en: We have allowed spending and borrowing to rise in this recession.
sentences.cn: 在此经济萧条时期，我们容许增加消费和借贷。

sentences.en: Whoever says that is not allowed.
sentences.cn: 无论谁这样说都是不允许的。

sentences.en: You must ink over your signature. Pencil writing is not allowed.
sentences.cn: 你必须把签名用墨水描一下。铅笔书写是不允许的。

trans.tran_cn: 允许( allow的过去式和过去分词 )，承认，酌增，接受
trans.tran_en: If someone is allowed to do something, it is all right for them to do it and they will not get into trouble
